      • showCurrent

        public void showCurrent()

      • run

        public void run(int meshFrameNumber)

      • createMaskImage

        public ij.ImageStack createMaskImage(ij.ImageStack mosaic)
        Creates a binary stack (ByteProcessor#threshold(int)) from the provided labelled image. First a threshold is used, then a fill holes is used.
        Parameters:
        mosaic - labelled image, where non-zero values represent a different cell/mesh
        Returns:
        stack of masked images.

      • fillHoles

        public void fillHoles(ij.process.ImageProcessor p)
        Fills holes, by inverting the processor (1-> 0 and 0->1) then labels the connected components. All of the regions that do not touch the edge are set to 255.
        Parameters:
        p - binary in put processor.

      • touchesEdge

        public boolean touchesEdge(List<int[]> pixels,
                           int width,
                           int height)
        checks if *any* of the provided pixels touch the edge of the box bound by x ∈ [0, width) and y ∈ [0, height)
        Parameters:
        pixels - x,y pairs of points.
        width - upper bounds for x. x=0 or x=width-1 touches.
        height - upper bounds for y. y=0 or y=height-1 touches.
        Returns:
        true if any pixel touches and edge, false otherwise.

      • createMembraneImage

        public ij.ImageStack createMembraneImage(ij.ImageStack mosaic)
        Creates a "binary" image, 255 or 0, of the membrane by checking neighboring neighboring pixels for either being background or another blob.
        Parameters:
        mosaic - stack of Labelled images. Each label corresponds to a separate cell/mesh
        Returns:
        stack stack of images with 255 for membrane and 0 for non-membrane.

        public ij.ImageStack createDistanceMapImage(ij.ImageStack mosaic)

        Creates Cerberus training data. Which will be isotropic in dimension and contain 3 aspects. Distance Transform Membrane and
        Parameters:
